segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, so engrossed in drying her dishes that she seems to be in a world of her own.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost funny how she is completely oblivious to the water spilling over the sink and forming a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but notice the boy on the stool, reaching perilously into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched, and the stool looks like it could tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her arm raised, waiting for her cookie, her posture full of eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they even realize how precarious their situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the chaos inside and the calm garden outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
